mission: Maximize human potential via children's education.

grant_recommendations.title: D-Prize – Distribution of Proven Interventions
grant_recommendations.summary: Funds scalable poverty solutions like Tembo's SMS/WhatsApp early childhood curriculum. Competitive but highly aligned.
grant_recommendations.why: Tembo's mobile early childhood curriculum fits perfectly into D-Prize's education-focused distribution model. Although D-Prize is competitive, the light effort and global eligibility make it a strong fit for piloting in new markets.

grant_recommendations.title: Roddenberry Foundation Catalyst Fund
grant_recommendations.summary: Provides $2,500–$15,000 seed grants for innovative, bold social impact projects like Tembo's mobile education model.
grant_recommendations.why: The Catalyst Fund favors bold, tech-driven solutions. Tembo's phone-based approach to education aligns well with their mission and the light application process makes this low-risk, high-reward.

grant_recommendations.title: DRK Venture Philanthropy Fellowship
grant_recommendations.summary: Prestigious 3-year fellowship ($300K) for scalable ventures. DRK mentors and funds mission-aligned early-stage orgs.
grant_recommendations.why: Although highly competitive, DRK's backing could be transformational. Tembo's global traction and 30u30 recognition offer credibility and mission alignment DRK looks for in high-growth, early-stage ventures.
